subject: p16508811
History: History: M with h/o recent PNA now w/ fevers and fatigue, worsening appearance of pulm infiltrates.
Findings: Right lower lung opacities are increased since, concerning for worsening or new pneumonia. The left lung is essentially clear. Mild bibasilar atelectasis is noted. The heart size is stable. The right hemodialysis catheter tip is seen in the right atrium. No pneumothorax or pulmonary edema.
Impression: Increased right lower lung pneumonia since, possibly involving the right lower lobe and right middle lobe.
